EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Account Review (1560433945.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Account Review (1560433945.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning Andrew,
I hope all is well. I am wondering if you would have some time this month or next month to do an account review. I would like to ensure what we have on file is meeting your business needs as well as ensure we have the appropriate contacts on file as well. Please let me know when you would have approximately 20 minutes for me. Should you need anything in the meantime please let me know. Thank you and have a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
